name: Colorful Piano Keys 2: Don't Tap the Wrong One
name_original: Colorful Piano Keys 2: Don't Tap the Wrong One
description:
Ready to be entertained? It's addictive and stimulating and once you start you won't want to put it down!

With several modes to choose from, you get to control the kind of game you play and how the screen appears. Whether you're trying to tap as many dark tiles as you can in a certain amount of time or try to tap all the light tiles, you don't want to miss any or the game will be over!

Fun music and easy instructions make this a game all ages can enjoy. Just don't let anyone else play or you might not get it back! It's that addictive.

The smooth gameplay and clear interface makes the game run effortlessly. It also boasts Game Center support. See how you stack up against other players! It might look easy, but you'll want to play over and over again until you master it!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
